summary: Traps across Skyrim are now far more powerful!
descriptionHtml:
========================
Traps Overhaul
========================
Author: Xylozi
Version: 2.1
Steam Alias: xylozi

Traps across Skyrim are now far more powerful!

**********************
Working on
**********************

Preventing followers activating pressure plates.
Adding new diseases.
Allowing pressure plates to be disarmed.

**********************
Changes
**********************

Damage values have been re-balanced so the damage percentage taken is mantained throughout leveling up.
Spears/Swinging Blades/Maces now cause visual stagger.
Darts, are now poisoned. 
Regular Spear, Disease Chance: 15%
Dwemer Spear, Disease Chance: 10%
Falmer Spear, Disease Chance: 20%
Notification on game load that the mod is active.

**********************
Notes on Changes
**********************

Assumptions:

Health is assumed static, only changes at the level thresholds
Level thresholds are:

Lv. 10 and below (represented by 1.)
Lv. 11 to 20 (represented by 2.)
Lv. 21 to 30 (represented by 3.)
Lv. 31 to 50 (represented by 4.)
Lv. 51 to 70 (represented by 5.)
Lv. 71 and above (represented by 6.)

Armour is accounted for in terms of damage reduction:

Lv. 0, Armour = 0%
Lv. 10, Armour = 10%
Lv. 20, Armour = 20%
Lv. 30, Armour = 30%
Lv. 50, Armour = 40%
Lv. 70, Armour = 50%

Health is assumed as:
1. 100
2. 140
3. 180
4. 220
5. 290
6. 360

The values are the damage values, scaling with player level. (e.g. 200 is the damage when you are Lv. 10 or less with the Battering Ram, whilst 720 is the damage when you are Lv. 71 plus)
Damage is per hit, and effect damage in not counted in the initial hit damage.
